item.title: Social Medium
item.description: Stats Are Not My Friend Part of the motivation for me to start writing posts here under my own space is down to two things: I can have more control over what I post and how it looks I don’t have any analytics Sure, it’s more complicated and time consuming to create, edit and publish new words here, and Medium.com gives me a really nice user experience to write in, but point #2 is the most pertinent.
